text: allaah aakaashon tatha dharatee ka prakaash hai, usake prakaash kee upama aisee hai, jaise ek taakha ho, jisamen deep ho, deep kaanch ke jhaad mein ho, jhaad motee jaise chamakate taare ke samaan ho, vah aise shubh zaitoon ke vrksh ke tel se jalaaya jaata ho, jo na poorvee ho aur na pashchimee, usaka tel sameep (sambhav) hai ki svayan prakaash dene lage, yadyapi use aag na lage. prakaash par prakaash hai. allaah apane prakaash ka maarg dikha deta hai, jise chaahe aur allaah logon ko udaaharan de raha hai aur allaah pratyek vastu se bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai
